header_text: You are planning your wedding with your fiancé. Planning your wedding has sometimes put stress on your relationship, and you and your fiancé have had a few arguments during the process. Once the wedding is over after everything that has happened, you think you and your spouse will feel less close.

elements.Text: Thinking about your future with your spouse, you see yourself
